casebody.data:
In re Julian H. EADY, Debtor. John J. GOGER, Trustee and Plaintiff, v. UNITED STATES of America; Georgia Department of Revenue, Withholding Tax Section; Georgia Sales and Use Tax Unit, State of Georgia, Department of Revenue; State of Georgia Central Audit Unit; Georgia Department of Labor, Employment Security Agency; State of Georgia Income Tax Unit; Tax Commissioner, De Kalb County; Tax Commissioner, Butts County; Tax Commissioner, Clayton County; Tax Commissioner, Henry County; Tax Commissioner, Newton County; Jack W. Chancey; Swan Construction Company, Inc.; Bags by Frances, Inc.; Jo Swan; Evelyn Dickmax; First Georgia Bank; C. J. Hulsey, Defendants. Bankruptcy No. 79-03140A. United States Bankruptcy Court, N. D. Georgia, Atlanta Division. Dec. 10, 1979 (Adversary). John J. Goger, Arrington, Rubin, Winter, Kirscher & Goger, Atlanta, Ga., for trustee and plaintiff.

Empty opinion
